verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's former press secretary Sean Spicer [V: has] unveiled a Melania Trump waxwork at Madame Tussauds museum in New York .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's former press secretary Sean Spicer] has [V: unveiled] [ARG1: a Melania Trump waxwork] [ARGM-LOC: at Madame Tussauds museum in New York] .
